course_title: Anesthesia for Surgical Procedures and Special Populations I
course_description: This course will discuss advanced concepts, principles and techniques of anesthetic management, specifically acute and chronic pain management including local and regional anesthetics, and regional and peripheral blocks.
prerequisites: NRSG 532 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1492, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TW 8-11:50a; M 8-11:20a, Instructor: R. Branch, Status: Closed
